name: Dog Onleashed
description:
Dog on Leash is a 3D Endless Runner where the player controls a dog pulling/dragging a human that is holding on to its leash. The objective is to achieve a high score by travelling as far as possible and collecting dog treats. The challenge is to maneuver the dog in a way so that both the human and the dog does not get hurt.

Created By:

Danny Hwangbo - Producer
Brendan Zwaan - Audio Engineer
Sharmaine Urbiztondo - 3D Artist
George Morris - 3D Artist
Hayden Simpson - Programmer
Thomas Sheppard - Programmer
Ethan Mitchell - Programmer
